Tim Kaine proposed a nearly: 4 billion tax increase during his first week as governor, including a tax increase on people earning as little as $17,000 a year.
Kaine: s proposal included raising taxes on auto insurance, vehicle purchases, and car registration fees.
Approximately 15 percent of the revenue: s plan would have come from imposing steep fines on individuals with chronically bad driving records.
